Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: bklojay
Reviews.Content: Though some of the decor in our room was 80's style retro, much of it was updated with modern pictures and newly placed white trim. The entire room and bathroom was clean and in good working order. The LG flat screen TV was very modern and a nice, comfortable touch. Our bed was pretty comfy as well. The staff was friendly and attentive to our needs, and the breakfast was delicious. Thus far, it's been the best quality in Champaign we've found for this price ($75 + tax , which includes a AAA discount).

Reviews.Title: “Best Baymont”
Reviews.Author: ReeSue
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at other Baymont Inns but never at one as nice as this one. I can't think of one negative aspect of our stay. Our first floor room was immaculate. The bed was very comfortable and the linens were especially nice. My husband even commented on the good quality of the sheets. The breakfast is very generous with fresh fruit, yogurt, assorted breads, rolls and Dunkin Donuts, cereals and two waffle irons. The breakfast room is a nice size. There was an attendant to keep everything supplied and the tables cleared. Complimentary USA today. We will return.

Reviews.Title: “very pleasant”
Reviews.Author: cartoro2
Reviews.Content: Spent a very pleasant overnight here. Haven't had great experiences with Baymonts before but this one was a definite upgrade. Clean, spacious, quiet, modern. Special mention to the pleasant check-in experience and very friendly (and well-managed and trained) staff - particularly the housekeeping staff who each gave genuine greetings and clearly cared about our stay. A slight smoky smell to the upper-floor hallway upon our arrival, but the non-smoking room was as fresh-smelling as any we'd recently been in.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised!”
Reviews.Author: Gene1321
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Baymont on the way to our granddaughter's wedding in Michigan. This was our first stay at a Baymont. We were pleased with the comfort and cleanliness of the room, friendly staff, good breakfast, and very reasonable price. While in Michigan, we were in a 3 star hotel, but the Baymont stay was more comfortable and enjoyable. We recommend it and will stop there again when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive, not impressive”
Reviews.Author: BrienNVanessa
Reviews.Content: The halls and stairways had an odor of air freshener. The place was generally clean and livable. The staff was not overly friendly. The overall feel is a little rundown. The room was clean and did not have the smell of the hallway. The bathroom was clean. The bedding was clean. The breakfast was good. We would stay here again if we need a quick pick but would probably try to find something better next time we visit U of I.

Reviews.Title: “Great road trip location, good rooms and good service.”
Reviews.Author: attours
Reviews.Content: We were on our way from Evansville, IN to Minneapolis, MN and just needed a place to stop that was close to the highway and restaurants that wasn't nasty. This hits all those marks very well. It was a minute or two off the highway, close to at least a dozen restaurants and the room was very clean and quite large for the price. And the breakfast was wonderf with fresh made (DIY) Belgian-style waffles, lots of muffin and cereal choices and fresh fruit. Definitely will be staying here on our next trip to grandmas.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay would definitely stay here again”
Reviews.Author: CallerJimmy
Reviews.Content: The staff was courteous and efficient. The room was very clean and comfortable complete with a fridge and microwave. The rooms towards I74 have a bit of road noise but not awful. Good value for a pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: MNSNOWBIRD1377
Reviews.Content: Great, clean hotel with good breakfast. Very comfortable, staff was nice, great AAA room rate. well worth the money. Very nice room and accomidations.

Reviews.Title: “Worst stay ever”
Reviews.Author: rrobertson
Reviews.Content: We stayed there with a large group of adults and kids. We were in for wrestling. Worst stay ever. I would advise you to stay in a different hotel in the area. They even tried to over charge us>

Reviews.Title: “Very happy, will stay again!”
Reviews.Author: Bruins
Reviews.Content: It was so nice to locate a clean, friendly, hotel that charges fair prices. Since my husband and I would not be arriving until after 11 pm, we did not want to spend a hideous amount of money on a room for the small amount of time we would be there. After looking at the reviews on trip advisor, I went with this hotel. I was very happy with the AAA price. Trip advisors once again did not let me down. Room was clean, nice big flat screen tv, room was quiet, towels nice. I am picky and this room was more than acceptable, and we have stayed at a lot of hotels. The bed comfort was ok, but it looked new. (Yes, I check for bedbugs) None to be found I'm happy to report! The breakfast was nice. More than we expected, even my husband was surprised with it. Check out person was very friendly, I needed to take a couple of cups to take some medicine while traveling, and he said no problem. We will definitely stay here again when we travel through. Other hotels should take lessons from this place. Clean, comfortable, friendly, without taking advantage with high prices.

Reviews.Title: “Great and was above expectations for a stay with our dogs”
Reviews.Author: dani42379
Reviews.Content: We got a great rate on this hotel for a one night stay. We have two dogs, one 25 pounder and one 45 pounder, who were welcome with a $10 per dog fee and a $50 refundable deposit. The pet rooms are convenient on the first floor. Also, unlike some hotels/motels that allow pets, we weren't stuck in a gross, outdated, smoking room to suffer with our dogs. The room was very clean and nice, same with the hall and common areas. The room was the expected size. We checked in late and were greeted by a very friendly and helpful gentleman at the front desk. The free continental breakfast the next morning was nice, offering toast, fruits, yogurt, cereals, waffles, juice, coffee....a typical free continental breakfast with enough quantity and variety to fill you up. Location was great for us as we were just passing through on the interstate.

Reviews.Title: “Does the trick”
Reviews.Author: FrankieFile
Reviews.Content: My needs were simple: clean, reasonably priced and no bedbugs. I've found that Baymont Inn chain meets those needs consistently. Check-in was a breeze. Our room was ready and clean. Amenities were sparse but, for the price, adequate. Location is near the mall and dining options abound. The 'free' breakfast, as expected, was heavy on the carbs with little other choices. I opted for dining out for a healthier variety. There is no pool at this facility, which was a disappointment. But we were only staying one night, on our way to Brown County State Park, so no big deal. If your looking for a simple, solid place to stay, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “well done!”
Reviews.Author: sadiedoggy
Reviews.Content: One of the nicest hotels I've stayed at at any price anywhere! Extremely clean, friendly helpful employees,well appointed rooms with tasteful decor, good quality breakfast items. great prices Green area with trees and picnic tables in back nice touch. Near the highway but pretty soundproof rooms

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but....”
Reviews.Author: buzybee150
Reviews.Content: The room seemed clean and the bathroom as well but the next day we all had bites on us that itched. The beds were comfortable and if it wasn't for the bites we would definitely stay again but just not sure.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: DJPace
Reviews.Content: The price was great. The room was updated and comfortable. Bed was very comfortable. Not a large room but served it's purpose. Front desk personnel Alek and Rachal were very nice and helpful. Even my daughter said this was one of my better choices in regards to inexpensive hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the price”
Reviews.Author: dragoms
Reviews.Content: My kids and I stayed here while visiting U of Illinois. The hotel was a good value for the price. The elevator was small and that bothered my daughter but wasn't really a big deal to me. The room is a bit small since the sink is to the left just as you enter the door. The bathroom is somewhat small with only a toilet and shower but I forgive that because the shower had excellent water pressure. The beds were comfortable. The breakfast was very good as well with waffles, bagels, etc. We know there was someone in the next room but could not here them. Many restaurants are nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Great place and value - Very pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: C-Stop
Reviews.Content: Clean and large rooms, very comfortable bed/pillows. The hotel is better than a 2 star hotel. Hotel has washer/dryer.

Reviews.Title: “Another Nice Stay At The Baymont Inn”
Reviews.Author: aussieg3
Reviews.Content: This was our third time staying at this pet friendly hotel and once again I have nothing but good things to say about the experience. The front desk and housekeeping staff were friendly as usual, the breakfast area was well-stocked and clean, the room itself was clean - including the microwave and firdge (love having these conveniences), and the mattress was very comfortable. The parking lot was well lit with plenty of parking and grassy areas for dog walking. Just a nice stay overall. I know I'll be staying at the Baymont on my next trip to Champaign and recommend that others give it a try.

Reviews.Title: “Staff if great!”
Reviews.Author: mikemontel
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here several times, a few months back I did encounter a problem with one of the front desk employees, however, this time around said employee was fine. I must say that the manager was awesome, as I requested to check in very early, and he definately accomidated. I will continue to stay here every time I am in town. If you encounter a problem, contact management, and they will take care of it..

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tq1008
Reviews.Content: We came in town for my grandfather's funeral, with other family members and our dog. The hotel staff was very nice and provided us with anything we needed. The rooms were clean and quiet and the mattress was just perfect. Breakfast was simple, but good. The location was great for us, plenty of restaurants close by and the close highway access was a plus. Great parking lot lighting too. We would stay there again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “This Baymont Inn is Bottom of the Barrel”
Reviews.Author: Ralph_Cramdon
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at Baymont Inns a few times over the years and most have been ok. This Baymont was a major disappointment. The Front Desk personnel were very pleasant and helpful. No complaints here. The room was designated as non-smoking. Judging from the stale smell, I'm guessing it was recently converted from a smoking room, and there was little or no effort made to deodorize it. * Very smelly room * Bed was clean and comfortable, however the carpet had a number of stains. Mini-fridge and microwave in room. As a business traveler, reliable high-speed internet is a MUST. This Baymont Inn & Suites claims to have "free high-speed internet". FREE? Yes. HIGH-SPEED? You be the judge: Based upon my tests (www.speedtest.net & others) the download speed is only marginally better than dialup (70k vs dialup 53k), and uploads take twice as long as dialup (22k vs dialup 53k). Latency is unbearable - fairly common for "cheapest of the cheap" satellite internet sevice. Bottom line: If you need high-speed internet , save yourself some frustration and look elsewhere. At this point I've given up on getting ANY online work done here in my room and will soon be heading into the night searching for a public wi-fi spot somewhere (hopefully) nearby. So much for a productive evening in my hotel room!

Reviews.Title: “Clean stay, fitness room was better than average.”
Reviews.Author: gotaluvme
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Baymont Inn in Champaign IL, was good. The room and bathroom were both clean. The staff was courtious and friendly. The room had two comfortable queen size beds, 1980's decore. The bathroom was a little small but was fine. Other parts of the property seem to have been updated recently. The fitness room was great, was near the front desk, had excellent equipment and was in a decent size room. The Breakfast was good.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Hawkeye054
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel regularly and have never been disappointed. The staff is very freindly and they have made considerable improvements on the property. New bedding, new shower fixtures, and a nicer room appearance.

Reviews.Title: “Gross and Rude”
Reviews.Author: SomeGuy987654321
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at various Baymont hotels as work for a company that has ties with them and they are generally fine to stay in - they are two stars so you get what you expect. However, this particular hotel had the rudest staff members i have ever encountered ( and my room was disgusting - i slept in my cloths i was so sickened). At one point, I came up to the front desk to inquire about the continental breakfast the next morning to see a customer in an argument a staff member over the cleanliness of her room. I only caught the end of it but it involved the words "roaches" and "i want a new room". Needless to say i wanted to know what was wrong ( the woman was only a few doors down from me). The Staffer told me to "mind my business and it wasn't my concern". If i hadn't been so tired i would have given her an earful. Either way, i would never stay there ever again... you shouldn't either.

HotelInfo.Name: Baymont Inn & Suites Champaign / Urbana
HotelInfo.Address: 302 W Anthony Dr, Champaign, IL 61821-1216
